services.name: AI-Powered Customer Journey Orchestration
services.overview: This service dynamically personalizes customer journeys in real-time, leveraging AI to predict customer behavior and preferences. It addresses the limitations of static customer journeys by adapting interactions to individual customer needs, thereby increasing engagement, conversion rates, and customer lifetime value. The system integrates with existing marketing automation platforms and customer data sources to deliver a seamless, personalized experience across multiple channels. By analyzing customer data, the AI engine identifies optimal next steps and content for each customer, triggering tailored interactions such as personalized email offers, product recommendations, and targeted content delivery.
problems_addressed: Ineffective static customer journeys leading to low engagement.
Lack of personalization resulting in decreased conversion rates.
Inability to adapt to real-time customer behavior changes.
Suboptimal marketing spend due to generic messaging.
Difficulty in achieving a unified and consistent customer experience across all channels.
core_features: Real-time Personalization Engine: Analyzes customer data from various sources to predict optimal next steps and content.
Multi-channel Orchestration: Triggers personalized interactions across multiple channels, including email, SMS, web, and in-app notifications.
Predictive Analytics Dashboard: Provides insights into customer behavior, predicted outcomes, and the effectiveness of personalized journeys.
A/B Testing and Optimization: Allows marketers to test different journey variations and optimize for maximum impact.
Integration with Marketing Automation Platforms: Seamlessly integrates with existing platforms like Marketo, HubSpot, and Salesforce Marketing Cloud.
user_journeys: A customer visits an e-commerce website for the first time. The system captures their browsing behavior and demographic data. Based on this data, the AI engine predicts the customer's interests and likelihood to purchase. If the customer adds an item to their cart but doesn't complete the purchase, the system triggers a personalized email with a discount code and product recommendations. If the customer completes the purchase, the system sends a thank-you email with personalized product recommendations based on their purchase history.
ai_capabilities: Predictive Modeling: Uses machine learning algorithms to predict customer behavior and preferences based on historical data.
Natural Language Processing (NLP): Analyzes customer reviews, social media posts, and email content to understand customer sentiment and identify relevant topics.
Recommendation Engine: Provides personalized product recommendations based on customer browsing history, purchase history, and demographic data.
Customer Segmentation: Automatically segments customers into different groups based on their behavior and preferences.

input_data_types: Website browsing behavior (page views, clicks, search queries)
Purchase history (products purchased, order value, purchase frequency)
CRM data (customer lifetime value, support tickets)
data_schema_recommendations: Customers table (customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, demographic_data)
Events table (event_id, customer_id, event_type, event_timestamp, event_data)
data_requirements.privacy_and_compliance: GDPR, CCPA, and other relevant data privacy regulations. Ensure data anonymization and consent management.

integration_plan.authentication_strategy: OAuth 2.0 for integrating with third-party platforms like Shopify, Klaviyo, and Google Analytics. JWT for securing API endpoints. Consider Clerk for managing user authentication and authorization.

technical_specifications.architecture: A microservices architecture with separate services for data ingestion, AI model training, prediction, and orchestration. An API gateway will manage incoming requests and route them to the appropriate services. The frontend will provide a dashboard for marketers to manage customer journeys and view analytics.

recommended_tech_stack.frontend: Next.js 14 App Router, TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui, Vercel conventions. Use React Query for efficient data fetching and caching.
recommended_tech_stack.backend: Node.js / Next.js server actions / Vercel serverless functions. Implement a RESTful API using Express.js or Next.js API routes.
recommended_tech_stack.database: Planetscale / Supabase / PostgreSQL with schema notes. Use Prisma or Sequelize as an ORM for database interactions.
recommended_tech_stack.storage: Supabase storage / AWS S3 / Vercel Blob for storing customer data and AI model artifacts.
recommended_tech_stack.AI: OpenAI API for NLP tasks, embeddings for customer similarity analysis, and vector DB (Pinecone/Supabase vectors) for storing and querying embeddings. Consider fine-tuning a GPT model for more personalized content generation.
recommended_tech_stack.APIs: REST APIs for communication between services and with external platforms.
recommended_tech_stack.CI_CD: GitHub â†’ Vercel automatic deploy pipeline for continuous integration and continuous deployment.

API_design: POST /customers: Creates a new customer record. Payload: {first_name, last_name, email, demographic_data}
GET /customers/{customer_id}: Retrieves customer information. Response: {customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, demographic_data}
POST /events: Records a customer event. Payload: {customer_id, event_type, event_timestamp, event_data}
GET /predictions/{customer_id}: Retrieves personalized recommendations for a customer. Response: {recommendations}
POST /journeys/{journey_id}/trigger: Triggers a specific journey for a customer. Payload: {customer_id}
frontend_components: Customer Dashboard: Displays customer information, event history, and personalized recommendations.
Journey Builder: Allows marketers to create and manage customer journeys.
Analytics Dashboard: Provides insights into customer behavior, predicted outcomes, and the effectiveness of personalized journeys.
Segment Builder: Allows marketers to create and manage customer segments based on various criteria.

deployment_instructions: Environment variables: OPENAI_API_KEY, SHOPIFY_API_KEY, KLAVIYO_API_KEY, GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_API_KEY, DATABASE_URL, SUPABASE_URL, SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
Vercel deployment: Connect GitHub repository to Vercel and configure environment variables. Enable automatic deployments on push.
Build outputs: Next.js static files for frontend, Node.js serverless functions for backend. Runtime settings: Node.js 18.x

pricing_strategy: SaaS subscription tiers based on the number of customer profiles analyzed per month.
Usage-based pricing for API calls to the AI engine.
Add-ons for premium features like dedicated support and custom model training.
customer_segments: Small businesses with limited marketing resources.
Mid-market companies seeking to improve customer engagement and conversion rates.
Enterprises looking to optimize marketing spend and personalize customer experiences at scale.

success_metrics: Customer Engagement KPIs: Website visit frequency, email open rates, click-through rates, time on site.
AI Performance KPIs: Prediction accuracy, recommendation relevance, customer segment purity.
Adoption/Engagement KPIs: Number of active users, customer journey completion rates, customer satisfaction scores, customer lifetime value.
